CustomField.description: Multiple platform counts based each platform roll up fields (hidden from layout)
CustomField.formula: IF( Platform_count_Property__c>0,1,0)+ If(Platform_count_Infrastructure__c>0,1,0)+ If( Platform_count_PE__c >0,1,0)+ If( Platform_count_Agriculture__c >0,1,0)+ If( Platform_count_Credit__c >0,1,0)+ If( Platform_count_Timberland__c >0,1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Multiple platform counts based each platform roll up fields (hidden from layout)
CustomField.label: Multiple Platform Investor
